title: 7 3D-printed tools that are surprisingly useful
description: These tools made via 3D printing are actually useful.
author: Jeff Butts
excerpt: Yes, 3D printers are terrific for producing trinkets and toys, but there are also plenty of highly useful tools you can print
text: 3D printing allows makers of all skill levels to create practical and personalized objects that can save time and effort. Whether you enjoy improving your home setup or experimenting with functional gadgets, there are many helpful tools you can easily produce with a printer. These items range from everyday conveniences to specialized aids that address unique needs. With some creativity, you can transform everyday chores into enjoyable and efficient tasks. Related Forget buying an expensive lathe; this project helps you build your own Rather than spending hundreds or thousands of dollars on a lathe, this open-source DIY project allows you to build your own. 7 A flexible set of measuring spoons Essential for hassle-free cooking and meal preparation Measuring spoons are essential kitchen tools, and 3D printing allows customization to suit your preferences. You can size them for common measurements or print a complete set for various culinary needs. Some filament types are food-safe for 3D printing, but filament properties should always be checked. To save space, you can experiment with unique designs like collapsible handles or nesting spoons. These lightweight tools are convenient for both seasoned cooks and beginners. They can be labeled in teaspoons, tablespoons, or metric units. Printing them in various colors adds aesthetics and ease of identification in busy kitchens. Personalizing your measuring spoons enhances your cooking routine. Measuring spoons often wear out or get lost, so 3D printing replacements ensure your kitchen remains organized and well-stocked. Having the tools you need close at hand streamlines your cooking routine. A 3D printer refreshes or upgrades your measuring spoons quickly. 6 A portable phone stand with storage Handy for video calls and quick organization on desks A compact phone stand with a built-in storage section is a helpful addition to work and home environments. It keeps your phone in a secure upright position for video conferences and streaming, while the storage compartment can hold small items like pens or charging cables. You can modify the design to suit different phone sizes or to accommodate additional accessories. This versatility means it can adapt to your changing needs over time. Printed from sturdy plastic filament, it offers durability for everyday handling. You can include cable management features, such as notches or loops that prevent tangled cords. If you like personal touches, adding a monogram or simple design elements is easy through your modeling or slicing software. Doing so gives you both a functional tool and a neat way to showcase your style. The stand’s portable nature is also convenient for travel or commutes between home and the office. Simply fold or keep it compact so it doesn’t take up much space in a bag. It is also a nice conversation starter among friends or coworkers when they see a custom device you created yourself. The best part is, if you ever need a different version, you can print a new one with minimal effort. 5 An adjustable spool holder for tape Efficiently manages sticky tape and other rolled materials A tape spool holder keeps your workspace tidy and ensures quick access to the tape. By 3D printing, you can customize it to hold standard tape rolls and specialized materials like masking or washi tape. This eliminates loose rolls scattered around a desk or workshop. A stable base dispenses tape smoothly, reducing hassle. The spool holder design typically includes a central rod for the tape roll and a serrated edge for cutting. Many 3D printing enthusiasts modify the cutting edge or add features like spare rolls or scissors slots. These options optimize the device for wrapping gifts or labeling items. The holder can match your workspace color scheme. Durability is another plus, as it can withstand frequent use and minor bumps. If you prefer a refined look, sand and paint the printed plastic for a smoother finish. You can easily replace worn parts or scale the design for larger rolls. This customization makes the spool holder a standout solution for easy tape access. 4 A customizable cable clip system Ideal for preventing tangles under desks and counters Cable clips are a must-have for anyone who dislikes cluttered cables around workstations, entertainment centers, or kitchen counters. With a 3D printer, you can produce clips in various sizes and shapes for different types of cables, including USB cords, headphones, and power wires. Their flexible design allows them to hold cords gently yet securely without the risk of damage. You can also create versions with adhesive backs or screw holes to fit specific mounting preferences. Printing multiple clips at once is a practical approach to managing all your cables. Some people prefer single-line clips, while others might require multi-cable organizers to sort larger bundles. The beauty of 3D printing is the ability to refine each design until it perfectly suits your setup. You can also experiment with fun or sophisticated finishes matching the surrounding décor. Using these clips reduces tangles and keeps walkways and desks looking neater. They can also improve safety by preventing tripping hazards and making it easier to spot and replace malfunctioning cords. By producing more clips on demand, you can expand your system as new devices enter your life. This flexibility ensures that your space remains organized over the long term. Keeps small parts and tools in dedicated compartments Tiny parts can quickly scatter during home improvement projects or smaller crafts. A 3D-printed organizer tray with multiple compartments keeps screws, nuts, bolts, and small tools in one tidy location. You can size the tray to fit specific spaces like drawers or shelves. Some designs have interlocking features for connecting trays side-by-side. The lightweight construction makes it easy to move parts without spilling. Before printing, you can modify the model dimensions to add extra depth for larger items. The organizer tray can include labels or color-coding to reduce confusion. It’s also helpful for crafters, hobbyists, or teachers who handle sets of beads, small art supplies, or classroom materials. The tray design can be customized to address specific organizational challenges. It’s easy to replicate or revise for different storage needs, making it a favorite project for those who crave order and efficiency. Designed to arrange creative or cleaning utensils neatly A custom holder designed to fit pens, brushes, screwdrivers, or other narrow items makes it simpler to keep your desk or workbench uncluttered. A 3D-printed version allows you to adjust hole diameters and depths to match each tool’s thickness and length. This ensures a snug fit, which prevents items from tipping or sliding around. In creative fields, it can also help you categorize brushes by type or size. The holder’s design can be modified to house several implements, making it perfect for specialized toolsets. For example, you might print one just for paintbrushes and another specifically for electronics repair tools. This kind of organization can speed up workflow and reduce the chance of misplacing crucial items. Since the printed holder is easy to clean, you can remove paint residue or dust without damaging it. 3D printing offers convenience for various activities, helping both seasoned professionals and hobbyists. Having all the tools in a dedicated place can spark more efficient creativity and higher-quality work. If you need different spacing or style, you can tweak the design and print a new version. This adaptability is what makes 3D printing an appealing way to keep essential tools within arm’s reach. 1 A sturdy sanding block with grip Comfortable for refinishing surfaces and smoothing project edges A sanding block is crucial for wood, plastic, and metalworkers. By printing your own, you can create a comfortable and precise shape. A 3D-printed sanding block usually has slots for attaching sandpaper sheets, allowing easy swapping. Sizes range from compact for tight corners to larger for broader surfaces. Tailor the block to your projects. A smaller, more precise block is ideal for detailed carving, while wider shapes cover large boards quickly. The comfortable grip reduces fatigue during long projects and improves refinishing outcomes. 3D printing materials withstand pressure and friction, so wear can be replaced or the design reprinted. Experiment with ergonomics or attachments. You get a personalized sanding tool that simplifies a repetitive chore. Elevate everyday tasks with creative customization 3D printing can bring a sense of excitement to everyday tasks, turning ordinary chores into opportunities to innovate. Whether you are cooking, cleaning, or organizing, these tools are a gateway to a more efficient and satisfying routine. The real beauty lies in the flexibility to customize each item, allowing you to refine functions and appearance in ways that off-the-shelf solutions cannot match. By printing your own measuring spoons, phone stands, organizers, and more, you gain the freedom to shape your surroundings to your exact preferences.
html:
3D printing allows makers of all skill levels to create practical and personalized objects that can save time and effort. Whether you enjoy improving your home setup or experimenting with functional gadgets, there are many helpful tools you can easily produce with a printer. These items range from everyday conveniences to specialized aids that address unique needs. With some creativity, you can transform everyday chores into enjoyable and efficient tasks.

Related

Forget buying an expensive lathe; this project helps you build your own

Rather than spending hundreds or thousands of dollars on a lathe, this open-source DIY project allows you to build your own.

7 A flexible set of measuring spoons

Essential for hassle-free cooking and meal preparation

Measuring spoons are essential kitchen tools, and 3D printing allows customization to suit your preferences. You can size them for common measurements or print a complete set for various culinary needs. Some filament types are food-safe for 3D printing, but filament properties should always be checked. To save space, you can experiment with unique designs like collapsible handles or nesting spoons.

These lightweight tools are convenient for both seasoned cooks and beginners. They can be labeled in teaspoons, tablespoons, or metric units. Printing them in various colors adds aesthetics and ease of identification in busy kitchens. Personalizing your measuring spoons enhances your cooking routine.

Measuring spoons often wear out or get lost, so 3D printing replacements ensure your kitchen remains organized and well-stocked. Having the tools you need close at hand streamlines your cooking routine. A 3D printer refreshes or upgrades your measuring spoons quickly.

6 A portable phone stand with storage

Handy for video calls and quick organization on desks

A compact phone stand with a built-in storage section is a helpful addition to work and home environments. It keeps your phone in a secure upright position for video conferences and streaming, while the storage compartment can hold small items like pens or charging cables. You can modify the design to suit different phone sizes or to accommodate additional accessories. This versatility means it can adapt to your changing needs over time.

Printed from sturdy plastic filament, it offers durability for everyday handling. You can include cable management features, such as notches or loops that prevent tangled cords. If you like personal touches, adding a monogram or simple design elements is easy through your modeling or slicing software. Doing so gives you both a functional tool and a neat way to showcase your style.

The stand’s portable nature is also convenient for travel or commutes between home and the office. Simply fold or keep it compact so it doesn’t take up much space in a bag. It is also a nice conversation starter among friends or coworkers when they see a custom device you created yourself. The best part is, if you ever need a different version, you can print a new one with minimal effort.

5 An adjustable spool holder for tape

Efficiently manages sticky tape and other rolled materials

A tape spool holder keeps your workspace tidy and ensures quick access to the tape. By 3D printing, you can customize it to hold standard tape rolls and specialized materials like masking or washi tape. This eliminates loose rolls scattered around a desk or workshop. A stable base dispenses tape smoothly, reducing hassle.

The spool holder design typically includes a central rod for the tape roll and a serrated edge for cutting. Many 3D printing enthusiasts modify the cutting edge or add features like spare rolls or scissors slots. These options optimize the device for wrapping gifts or labeling items. The holder can match your workspace color scheme.

Durability is another plus, as it can withstand frequent use and minor bumps. If you prefer a refined look, sand and paint the printed plastic for a smoother finish. You can easily replace worn parts or scale the design for larger rolls. This customization makes the spool holder a standout solution for easy tape access.

4 A customizable cable clip system

Ideal for preventing tangles under desks and counters

Cable clips are a must-have for anyone who dislikes cluttered cables around workstations, entertainment centers, or kitchen counters. With a 3D printer, you can produce clips in various sizes and shapes for different types of cables, including USB cords, headphones, and power wires. Their flexible design allows them to hold cords gently yet securely without the risk of damage. You can also create versions with adhesive backs or screw holes to fit specific mounting preferences.

Printing multiple clips at once is a practical approach to managing all your cables. Some people prefer single-line clips, while others might require multi-cable organizers to sort larger bundles. The beauty of 3D printing is the ability to refine each design until it perfectly suits your setup. You can also experiment with fun or sophisticated finishes matching the surrounding décor.

Using these clips reduces tangles and keeps walkways and desks looking neater. They can also improve safety by preventing tripping hazards and making it easier to spot and replace malfunctioning cords. By producing more clips on demand, you can expand your system as new devices enter your life. This flexibility ensures that your space remains organized over the long term.

Keeps small parts and tools in dedicated compartments

Tiny parts can quickly scatter during home improvement projects or smaller crafts. A 3D-printed organizer tray with multiple compartments keeps screws, nuts, bolts, and small tools in one tidy location. You can size the tray to fit specific spaces like drawers or shelves. Some designs have interlocking features for connecting trays side-by-side.

The lightweight construction makes it easy to move parts without spilling. Before printing, you can modify the model dimensions to add extra depth for larger items. The organizer tray can include labels or color-coding to reduce confusion.

It’s also helpful for crafters, hobbyists, or teachers who handle sets of beads, small art supplies, or classroom materials. The tray design can be customized to address specific organizational challenges. It’s easy to replicate or revise for different storage needs, making it a favorite project for those who crave order and efficiency.

Designed to arrange creative or cleaning utensils neatly

A custom holder designed to fit pens, brushes, screwdrivers, or other narrow items makes it simpler to keep your desk or workbench uncluttered. A 3D-printed version allows you to adjust hole diameters and depths to match each tool’s thickness and length. This ensures a snug fit, which prevents items from tipping or sliding around. In creative fields, it can also help you categorize brushes by type or size.

The holder’s design can be modified to house several implements, making it perfect for specialized toolsets. For example, you might print one just for paintbrushes and another specifically for electronics repair tools. This kind of organization can speed up workflow and reduce the chance of misplacing crucial items. Since the printed holder is easy to clean, you can remove paint residue or dust without damaging it.

3D printing offers convenience for various activities, helping both seasoned professionals and hobbyists. Having all the tools in a dedicated place can spark more efficient creativity and higher-quality work. If you need different spacing or style, you can tweak the design and print a new version. This adaptability is what makes 3D printing an appealing way to keep essential tools within arm’s reach.

1 A sturdy sanding block with grip

Comfortable for refinishing surfaces and smoothing project edges

A sanding block is crucial for wood, plastic, and metalworkers. By printing your own, you can create a comfortable and precise shape. A 3D-printed sanding block usually has slots for attaching sandpaper sheets, allowing easy swapping. Sizes range from compact for tight corners to larger for broader surfaces.

Tailor the block to your projects. A smaller, more precise block is ideal for detailed carving, while wider shapes cover large boards quickly. The comfortable grip reduces fatigue during long projects and improves refinishing outcomes.

3D printing materials withstand pressure and friction, so wear can be replaced or the design reprinted. Experiment with ergonomics or attachments. You get a personalized sanding tool that simplifies a repetitive chore.

Elevate everyday tasks with creative customization

3D printing can bring a sense of excitement to everyday tasks, turning ordinary chores into opportunities to innovate. Whether you are cooking, cleaning, or organizing, these tools are a gateway to a more efficient and satisfying routine. The real beauty lies in the flexibility to customize each item, allowing you to refine functions and appearance in ways that off-the-shelf solutions cannot match. By printing your own measuring spoons, phone stands, organizers, and more, you gain the freedom to shape your surroundings to your exact preferences.
